00040 #ifndef _vector3wactor_h
00041 #define _vector3wactor_h
00042 
00043 #include "vector3.h"
00044 #include "actorbase.h"
00045 
00046 namespace phys
00047 {
00048     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00049     /// @class Vector3WActor
00050     /// @headerfile vector3wactor.h
00051     /// @brief This class is used to store or transfer a position relative to an Actor.
00052     /// @details This class is simply a Pointer to an actor and a Vector3
00053     class Vector3WActor
00054     {
00055         public:
00056             /// @brief Default Constructor
00057             /// @details This creates a Vector3WActor with a null Actor pointer and
00058             /// a Vector3 initialized to 0
00059             Vector3WActor();
00060 
00061             /// @brief Complete Constructor
00062             /// @details This fills the class with data that is passed in.
00063             /// @param Actor_ This is a pointer to an actor
00064             /// @param Vector_ This is a Vector3 that represents some amount, like motion or distance
00065             Vector3WActor(ActorBase* Actor_, Vector3 Vector_);
00066 
00067             /// @brief The pointer to the ActorBase
00068             ActorBase* Actor;
00069 
00070             /// @brief The pointer to the Vector3
00071             Vector3 Vector;
00072     };
00073 
00074 
00075 }// /phys
00076 
00077 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Vector3WActor& x);
00078 
00079 #endif
